name: Name
enter_the_otp_you_received_to: Enter the OTP you received to
these_3_tasks_can_be_done_even_before_me: These 3 tasks can be done even before meeqaat
turn_on_your_location_to_find_your_meeqa: Turn on your location to find your meeqaat
permission_description: This App requires access to your location at all times to accurately calculate distance. Please enable "Allow all the time" location permission in your device settings.
auto_generate_description: This will generate ziarat destinations based on current location
manual_selection_description: You can create your ziarat journey by selecting the destinations manually
please_select_one_option_to_continue_you: Please select one option to continue your ziarat
now_please_pray_while_facing_kibla:
Now please pray while
facing kibla
round_second_dua: لَبَّيْكَ اللَّهُمَّ لَبَّيْكَ، لَبَّيْكَ لَا شَرِيكَ لَكَ لَبَّيْكَ، إِنَّ الْحَمْدَ وَالنِّعْمَةَ لَكَ وَالْمُلْكُ، لَا شَرِيكَ لَكَ
may_allah_accept_your_umra_ameen:
May Allah accept your Umra
Ameen
shave_the_head_description: It is preferable for men to shave their entire head, but if they trim their hair to the extent of a fingertip from the entire head, that is also permissible.
take_a_bath_ghusl_or_perform_ablution_wu: Take a bath (ghusl) or perform ablution (wudu) and then wear the Ihram.
